item.description:
Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton

Sunday Oct 25, 2:00pm (meet at 1:45, launch at 2:00)

Let's see if we can squeak one last trip in to close out the season! It's supposed to be dry and in the 50s Sunday, so this could work. Hopefully there will be some foliage too (though there may not be much left after Saturday's rain!), please dress for the cooler weather, wetsuit not a bad idea if you have one...

For more information - http://www.mass.gov/d...

It's directly on Rt. 135 in Hopkinton. I'll leave it to everyone to check a map for their best way there.
item.name: Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton
